"A.P.228/8/7": "Yo, teacher! Long time no see! I've been waiting forever to see you!"
"Listening to your stories and watching you in action beats those classroom lessons any day!"
"So you gotta teach me something new, ya know? Um... teacher?"
"...Are you maybe leaving someplace far away?"
"Bullseye, huh? Aw man... and I haven't known you for all that long."
"...I know! I'll drop out of school and go with you! I only want to learn what you have to teach!"
"I can't go because I'm not an ARKS yet? ...So I could go with you if I was?"
"You're going to say no, aren't you? I knew that before asking, from one look at your face."
"I'm unqualified? Geez, you show no mercy! Yeah, I get it."
"But tell me something... even if I was qualified, you wouldn't take me, would you?"
"If you just say yes, I swear I'll get way stronger so I can help you out, teacher!"
"...Just you wait! I'll catch up to you teacher! Be prepared!"
